The horizontal distance between points B and C is x_{BC} = 0.9 m.
The height of the experimental platform above the ground is h = 0.53 m.

The horizontal distance x_{BC} is covered in time t: x_{BC} = v_B * t
The vertical velocity component just before landing is given by: v_y = g * t = 9.8 * 0.327
